41005009	Yesu kamuuza, “Twaga jako nani?” Munhu ayo kamwidika, “Twaga jangu Lunhu, kwavija twa wengi!”
41005010	Kampula Yesu sekeyawagale ivinyamkela kunze ya isi ija.
41005011	Kukala na bumbila kulu da nguluwe wakala woja kuna umtelemuko wa kigongo.
41005012	Avo vinyamkela wampula Yesu, “Tugale kwa nguluwe, na utuleke tuwengile wao.”
41005013	Yesu kawatogolela, avo vinyamkela wamulawa munhu ayo, na wengila mna iwanguluwe. Bumbila jose da nguluwe elufu mbili wahumulukila kudilamba, wose wafila mumo.
41005014	Wanhu wakalile wowasusila nguluwe awo wakimbila na kuzibwililisa mbuli azo mwiisi na kumigunda. Abaho wanhu wachola kulola kija kilawilile.
41005015	Viwavikile kwa Yesu, wamona munhu ayo yakalile na vinyamkela kakala aho na kavala goya viwalo, na nzewele zake zimbwelela na wanhu wose wadumba.
41005016	Wanhu wachone acho kilawilile, wawalongela wayao gaja gampatile munhu ayo yakalile na vinyamkela, na mbuli za nguluwe.
41005017	Avo wanhu wampula Yesu yasegele mwiisi yao.
41005018	Yesu viyakalile kokwela mwiingalawa, munhu ayo yakalile na vinyamkela kampula Yesu wachole wose.
41005019	Lakini Yesu kamulemela, kamulongela, “Bwela ukayako ukawalongele wanhu wa lukolo lwako gaja gose Mndewa gayakutendele, na viyakonele bazi.”
41005020	Avo munhu ayo kasegela, kachola hanhu hakemigwe Dekapoli, kawalongela wanhu gaja gose Yesu gayamtendele. Wanhu wose wahulike wakanganya.
41005021	Yesu kabwela mwambu uyagwe wa lamba. Lunhu lwa wanhu lumzunguluka kumgwazo wa lamba.
41005022	Abaho keza mkulu imoja wa ng'anda ya kumpula Mulungu, twaga jake Yailo. Viyamone Yesu, kaibwanha hasi mmagulu gake,
41005023	kampula ng'hani, “Mndele wangu kolumwa ng'hani. Nokupula chonde chonde, wize ukamwikile makono muladi yahone na yawe mgima.”
41005024	Abaho Yesu kachola na Yailo, lunhu mkulu lwa wanhu lumkweleleza kuno lomsung'ha sung'ha.
41005025	Baho kukala na mtwanzi yakalile na utamu wa kutumika kwa miyaka longo na mibili.
41005026	Mtwanzi ayo kachola kwa waganga wengi na katumia vinhu vose viyakalile navo, lakini hahonile bule, ila kagendelela kulumwa ng'hani.
41005027	Viyazihulike mbuli za Yesu, kengila mna ulunhu lwa wanhu, kamcholela Yesu kukisogo na kakwasa kiwalo chake.
41005028	Kailongela mwenyego, “Nahakwasa kiwalo chake, nohona.”
41005029	Viyakwasile kiwalo cha Yesu, bahaja kutumika kuleka, nayo kahulika kahona utamu wake.
41005030	Bahaja Yesu kajuwa nguvu zimulawa, avo kahinduka muulunhu na kuuza, “Nani yanikwasile kiwalo changu?”
41005031	Wanahina zake wamwidika, “Kowona wanhu viwokusung'ha sung'ha, abaho kouza nani yakukwasile?”
41005032	Lakini Yesu kalola mhande zose ili yamone munhu yatendile vivo.
41005033	Mtwanzi ayo kajuwa kinhu kimulawilile, avo kamgendela Yesu kuno kodumba na kugwaya. Kamfugamila Yesu, kamulongela fulu ipile.
41005034	Yesu kamulongela mtwanzi ayo, “Mwanangu, kutamanila kwako kukuhonya. Genda moyo uholile, kuhona utamu wako.”
41005035	Yesu viyakalile kogendelela kulonga, wasenga kulawa ukayake Yailo weza na kumulongela Yailo, “Mndele wako kafa. Habali kogendelela kumgaza Mfundiza?”
41005036	Yesu viyazihulike mbuli azo zilongigwe na wasenga awo, hazigesile bule, lakini kamulongela Yailo, “Sekeudumbe, togola tu.”

41005040	Lakini wamseka, avo Yesu kawalava kunze wose, kamsola tatake na mamake ija imwana, na waja wanahina zake wadatu. Wengila mna idigati mulutambalizwe lukuli lwa mwana ayo.
41005041	Yesu kamgoga mkono, kamulongela, “Talita Kumi!” fambulo jake, “Mndele, nokulongela lamuka!”
41005042	Bahaja mndele ayo kenuka na kasonga kugenda. Mndele ayo kakala na miyaka longo na mibili. Mbuli ino viilawilile, wanhu wakanganya ng'hani.

41006001	Yesu kasegela hanhu aho kachola kudibuga diyavumbuke, na wanahina zake wamkweleleza.
41006002	Vidivikile siku da Kubwihila, Yesu kasonga kufundiza mng'anda ya kumpula Mulungu. Wanhu wamuhulike wakanganya ng'hani, waiuza, “Munhu ino kazipata kwahi mbuli zino? Nzewele gani ino mbaka kodaha kutenda unzonza uno?
41006003	Vino ino siyo ija fundi selemala, mwanage Malia, na ndugu zake Yakobo na Yusufu na Yuda na Simoni? Vino lumbu zake hawakala bahano bule?” Avo wamulema.

41006005	Yesu hatendile unzonza wowose, ila kawekila makono watamu kidogo na kawahonya.

41006021	Siku dimoja, Helodiya kapata nyafasi mna idisiku da kukumbuka kuvumbuka kwa Helode. Helode kawatendela nyimwili nyimwili ng'hulu wakulu wa mabuga, na wakulu wa wakalizi, na walangulizi wa isi ya Galilaya.

41006023	Kaiduila, “Noiduila, nokugwaa chochose chondaunipule, hata nusu ya undewa wangu nokugwaa!”
41006024	Avo mndele ayo kalawa kunze kamuuza mamake, “Nipule choni?” Nayo kamwidika, “Pula pala da Yohana Mbatizaji.”
41006025	Bahaja mndele ayo kakimbila mbaka kwa mndewa, kamulongela, “Sambi baha nigwelele pala da Yohana Mbatizaji mditanda!”
41006026	Mndewa kona usungu ng'hani, lakini kwavija kaiduila mgameso ga wanhu wagonekigwe, hadahile kumulemela.
41006027	Bahaja mndewa kamulagiza mkalizi yadigale pala da Yohana. Mkalizi kagenda mkifungo, kakanha pala da Yohana.

41006030	Watumigwa wabwela, waiting'hana na Yesu na wamulongela gaja gose gawatendile na kufundiza.

41006047	Viivikile ichungulo, ngalawa ikala hagati ya lamba, lakini Yesu kakala yaiyeka mwiisi inyalile.
41006048	Yesu kawona wanahina zake wolemelwa kutowa ng'hafi, kwavija beho kulu dikala dowabweza kuwalawile. Nzogolo zikwika, Yesu kawagendela, kuno kotembela uchanha mgamazi. Kalonda kuwabita,
41006049	lakini viwamone kotembela uchanha mgamazi, wagizaga mzimu. Wakemelela kwa bwembwe.
41006050	Wose viwamone wadumba ng'hani. Bahaja Yesu kawalongela, “Gangamaleni! Iyo nene! Sekemudumbe!”

41006052	kwavija wakala hawajuwile fambulo da kuwagwaa lujo wanhu elufu tano, mizoyo yao ikala midala.
41006053	Waloka umwambu, wavika kuna iisi ya Genesaleti, baho waifunga ngalawa yao.
41006054	Bahaja viwahumuluke mwiingalawa, wanhu wamjuwa Yesu.
41006055	Avo wakimbila mwiisi yose, na kila hanhu viwahulike Yesu kabaho wamgalila watamu watambalale mvisazi vao.
41006056	Kila hanhu Yesu hayacholile, iwe mna ivijiji, hebu mna gamabuga, hebu mna imigunda, wanhu wawasola watamu zao na kuwagala kuna gamagulilo. Wampula Yesu yawatogolele waikwase mhindo ya kiwalo chake. Wose waikwasile wahona.
41007001	Mafalisayo na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wayagwe wezile kulawa Yelusalemu waiting'hana haulongozi wa Yesu.
41007002	Wawona wanahina wayagwe wa Yesu woja bila kusunha makono gao kamba viilondeka wanhu watende.
41007003	Mafalisayo na Wayahudi wayagwe wokweleleza mafundizo gawabokele kwa wahenga zao, hawaja kinhu mbaka wasunhe makono gao ng'hani.
41007004	Wala hawaja kinhu chochose kulawa kudigulilo mbaka wasunhe, na wokweleleza mafundizo gayagwe mengi kamba vija mwiko wa kusunha vikasi na nongo na viya va shaba na gayagwe mengi.
41007005	Avo Mafalisayo na Wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wamuuza Yesu, “Habali wanahina zako hawakweleleza mafundizo gatugoleligwe na wahenga zetu, lakini woja bila kusunha makono?”
41007006	Yesu kawedika, “Mweye mwa watapitapi! Kumbe mtula ndagu wa Mulungu Isaya kalagula goya mbuli zenu viyandike, ‘Mulungu kolonga, wanhu wano, wonitegeleza kwa milomo yao, lakini mizoyo yao yakutali ng'hani na niye.
41007007	Awo wonitambikila bule, kwavija wofundiza mafundizo ga wanhu, na kugatenda kamba galawa kwa Mulungu!’
41007008	“Mweye mogaleka Malagizo ga Mulungu na mogagoga mafundizo ga wanhu.”
41007009	Yesu kagendelela kulonga, “Mweye mwa wabala kwa kulema Malagizo ga Mulungu na kugagoga mafundizo genu wenyego.
41007010	Kwavija Musa kawalagiza, ‘Mtegeleze tatako na mamako,’ ‘Munhu yoyose yonda yamulige tatake hebu mamake kolondeka yakomigwe.’
41007011	Lakini mweye mofundiza, kamba munhu kana kinhu kodaha kumtaza tatake hebu mamake lakini kolonga ‘Ino kobani’ fambulo jake kinhu kino nimulavila Mulungu,
41007012	munhu ayo halondeka kumtaza tatake hebu mamake.
41007013	Kwa nzila ino mafundizo genu gomuwagwaa wanhu gosegeza mbuli za Mulungu. Na gayagwe mengi kamba gano gomutenda.”
41007014	Abaho Yesu kalukema lunhu lwa wanhu kabili na kalulongela, “Mweye mose mnitegeleze na mujuwe.
41007015	Kuduhu kinhu kingila mmulomo wa munhu kulawa kunze kidaha kumgela munhu dikwe. Lakini, kija kilawa mmulomo wa munhu acho kimgela munhu dikwe.”
41007016	Munhu yeli na magwiti yahulike.
41007017	Yesu na wanahina zake, viwalulekile lunhu lwa wanhu na kwingila mng'anda, wanahina zake wamuuza yawalongele fambulo da ulonzi uja.
41007018	Yesu kawalongela, “Vino mweye mduhu nzewele kubanza wanhu wayagwe? Vino hamujuwile kamba kuduhu kinhu kingila mmulomo wa munhu kulawa kunze kidaha kumgela munhu dikwe?
41007019	Kwavija hakingila muumoyo lakini mna iinda na abaho cholawa kunze ya lukuli.” Kwa ulonzi uno Yesu kavitenda vinhu vose va kuja vinoge kudigwa.
41007020	Kagendelela kulonga, “Kinhu kilawa muumoyo wa munhu acho kimgela munhu dikwe.
41007021	Kwavija muumoyo wa munhu molawa magesa gehile na kuiwasa chaka chaka na ubavi na ukomaji,
41007022	na ugoni na umelo na gehile na uvizi na kusulukila na migongo na maligo na kuitapa na ubozi.
41007023	Ago gose gehile golawa mgati mwa munhu na kumgela munhu dikwe.”
41007024	Abaho Yesu kahalawa hanhu aho kachola mwiimbaka ili behi na buga da Tilo. Kengila mng'anda na halondile munhu yoyose yajuwe kakala aho, lakini hadahile bule kuifisa.
41007025	Mtwanzi imoja, yakalile na mndele wake yeli na kinyamkela, viyahulike mbuli za Yesu, bahaja kamgendela na kamfugamila Yesu.
41007026	Mtwanzi ayo hakalile Muyahudi, kavumbuka kudibuga da Silofoinike mwiisi ya Siliya kampula Yesu yamulave mndele wake kinyamkela.
41007027	Lakini Yesu kamwidika, “Tanhu waleke wana wegute. Kwavija havinogile bule kusola lujo lwa iwana na kuwapigisila umbwa.”
41007028	Mtwanzi ayo kamwidika, “Ona, go mkulu, lakini hata umbwa weli hasi mmeza woja kija kisigazigwe na iwana!”
41007029	Yesu kamulongela mtwanzi ayo, “Kwavija kwidika vivo, bwela ukayako na komvika mndele wako kinyamkela kamulawa!”
41007030	Mtwanzi ayo kachola ukayake, viyavikile kamvika mndele wake katambalala mulusazi na kinyamkela kakala yamulawile.
41007031	Yesu kasegela kachola behi na isi ya Tilo kwa kubitila mwiisi ya Sidoni mbaka kudilamba da Galilaya kwa kubitila nzila ya mna zimbaka za Dekapoli.
41007032	Wanhu wayagwe wamgalila munhu yakalile hahulika na halonga, wampula Yesu yamwikile makono.
41007033	Yesu kamsola kamgala hamgwazo hanhu kuduhu wanhu. Yesu kengiza vidole mna gamagwitwi ga munhu ayo, katema mate kamkwasa lulimi.
41007034	Abaho Yesu kalola kuulanga, kabweza mhumuzi, kamulongela, “Efata!” fambulo jake, “Vuguka!”
41007035	Bahaja munhu ayo magwiti gake gavuguka na kakala yohulika na kulonga bila kugaya.
41007036	Abaho Yesu kawagomesa wanhu awo sekewamulongele munhu yoyose mbuli ayo, lakini Yesu viyagendelele kuwagomesa, vivo viwagendelele kuibwililisa mbuli ayo.
41007037	Wanhu wose waihulike mbuli ayo wakanganya. Walonga, “Katenda goya kila kinhu, kowatenda wanhu hawahulika wahulike na wanhu hawalonga walonge!”
41008001	Hazibitile siku nyingi lunhu luyagwe lukulu lwa wanhu luiting'hana. Wanhu viwakalile waduhu kinhu chochose cha kuja Yesu kawakema wanahina zake kawalongela,

41008003	Nahawalongela wabwele ukayao na nzala, wosinduka mnzila, kwavija wanhu wayagwe walawa kutali.”
41008004	Wanahina zake wamuuza, “Hano hatwili twa kuluwala, tolupata kwahi lujo lwa kuwagwaa wanhu wose wano?”

41008020	Kawauza kabili, “Vivija vinibanzule gaja magate saba na kuwagwaa wanhu elufu nne, vino mmemeza vigelo vingapi kwa avo visigale?” Wamwidika, “Tumemeza vigelo saba.”
41008021	Abaho kawauza, “Mung'hali hamnavijuwa?”
41008022	Yesu na wanahina zake viwavikile Betisaida, wanhu wayagwe wamgalila Yesu munhu yakalile msuwameso, wampula yamkwase.
41008023	Yesu kamgoga mkono munhu ayo, kamulava kunze ya kijiji kija. Abaho kamtemela mate mgameso, kamwikila makono, kamuuza, “Vino kokona choni?”
41008024	Munhu ija kalola, kalonga, “Nowona wanhu, lakini waigala na mibiki itembela.”
41008025	Yesu kamwikila makono kabili mgameso. Munhu ayo kabunhula meso na meso gake galola, nayo kadaha kulola goya vinhu vose.
41008026	Yesu kamulongela munhu ayo yachole ukayake, kamzuma, “Sekeyabweleganye mna ikijiji.”
41008027	Abaho Yesu na wanahina zake wachola kuna ivijiji va Kaisalia ya Filipi, mnzila Yesu kawauza wanahina zake, “Nongeleni wanhu wolonga niye na nani?”
41008028	Wamwidika, “Wanhu wayagwe wolonga gweye kwa Yohana Mbatizaji, wanhu wayagwe wolonga gweye kwa Eliya, kuno wayagwe wolonga gweye kwa imoja wa watula ndagu wa Mulungu.”
41008029	Yesu kawauza, “Na mweye molonga niye na nani?” Petulo kamwidika, “Gweye kwa Kilisito Mkombola.”
41008030	Abaho Yesu kawagomesa wanahina zake, “Sekemumulongele munhu yoyose mbuli zangu.”
41008031	Abaho Yesu kasonga kuwafundiza wanahina zake, “Mwana wa Munhu kolondeka yadununzigwe ng'hani na kulemigwa na wavele na wakulu wa walava nhosa na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa. Kokomigwa na siku da kadatu kozilibuka.”
41008032	Yesu kawalongela fulu ipile, avo Petulo kamgala Yesu kumgwazo kasonga kumkomhokela.
41008033	Lakini Yesu kahinduka kawalola wanahina zake, kamkomhokela Petulo, “Segela kumwangu Mwenembago! Kwavija hugesa mbuli za Mulungu lakini kogesa mbuli za kiunhu!”
41008034	Abaho Yesu kalukema lunhu lwa wanhu na wanahina zake kawalongela, “Munhu yoyose yahalonda kunikweleleza, yaileme mwenyego na kuidikwa msalaba wake yanikweleleze.
41008035	Kwavija munhu yoyose yahalonda kuukombola ugima wake kowagiza, na munhu yoyose yowagiza ugima wake mbuli ya niye na kwa Mbuli Inogile koukombola.
41008036	Vino munhu kopata choni kamba yahaipata isi yose na kuwagiza ugima wake?
41008037	Kuduhu kinhu chonda yalave yaubweze ugima wake.
41008038	Munhu yoyose yonyonela kinyala niye na mafundizo gangu mna ulukolo lwa sambi lulekile kumjuwa Mulungu na kutenda gehile, Mwana wa Munhu nayo komonela kinyala munhu ayo yaheza muukulu wa Tatake na wasenga zake wang'alile wa kuulanga.”
41009001	Yesu kagendelela kulonga, “Nowalongela ukweli, wanhu wayagwe weli hano hawafa bule mbaka wawone Undewa wa Mulungu ukwiza na nguvu.”
41009002	Vizibitile siku sita, Yesu kamsola Petulo, Yakobo na Yohana, kachola nao waiyeka kuna ulugongo lutali. Viwakalile wolola, Yesu kagaluka.
41009003	Viwalo vake vikala vizelu chuwee, na kuduhu munhu yoyose mwiisi yodaha kuvifuwa viwe vizelu kamba vivo.

41009006	Petulo hajuwile cha kulonga kwavija heyo na wayage wakala wodumba.
41009007	Abaho dilawilila wingu na kuwagubika na sauti ilawa mdiwingu, ilonga, “Ino ayo Mwanangu inimnogele. Mumtegeleze!”

41009010	Watogola kija kiwalongeligwe, lakini wasonga kuiuza, “Kuzilibuka kwa wafile, fambulo jake choni?”

41009013	Nowalongeleni, Eliya kamala kwiza na wanhu wamtendela viwalondile, kamba vija Maandiko Gang'alile vigalonga.”

41009018	Kinyamkela ayo yahamwizila, komulagaza hasi na kolawa miholovu mumulomo, kodafuna meno na kunyala lukuli lose. Niwalongela wanahina zako wamulave ikinyamkela, lakini hawadahile bule.”
41009019	Yesu kawalongela, “Mweye wanhu muleka kutamanila! Ng'hale na mweye mbaka lini? Nogela kitumbe kumgongo mbaka lini? Ngalileni hano imbwanga.”
41009020	Avo wamgala kwa Yesu. Bahaja kinyamkela viyamone Yesu, kamgela kisango imbwanga ayo, kagwa hasi, kaibimbilisa, kuno kolava mihovu mumulomo.
41009021	Yesu kamuuza tata wa imbwanga ayo, “Utamu uno umsonga lini?” Kamwidika, “Umsonga toka haudodo.
41009022	Miyanza mingi kinyamkela kamgeza kumkoma kwa kumbwanha muumoto na mgamazi. Tonele bazi na ututaze, kamba wahadaha!”
41009023	Yesu kamulongela, “Kolonga, kamba wahadaha! Kila kinhu chodahika kwa munhu yotamanila.”
41009024	Bahaja tata wa imbwanga ija kakemelela, “Notamanila, lakini kutamanila kwangu kudodo. Nhaze nitamanile ng'hani!”
41009025	Yesu viyaluwone lunhu lowamemela, kamkomhokela kinyamkela ayo, “Gweye kinyamkela wa kuleka kulonga na kuhulika, nokulagiza umulawe mbwanga ino, sekeumwingile kabili!”

41009027	Lakini Yesu kamgoga mkono mbwanga ayo kamtaza kwinuka, nayo kenuka.

41009032	Lakini wanahina zake hawadijuwile fambulo da ulonzi awo na wadumba kumuuza.
41009033	Wavika Kapelinaumu, viwengile mng'anda, Yesu kawauza wanahina zake, “Mukala muibamilila choni mnzila?”
41009034	Lakini wanahina zake hawamwidike bule, kwavija mnzila wakala woibamilila nani yeli munhu mkulu viweli.
41009035	Yesu kakala hasi, kawakema wanahina zake longo na wabili, kawalongela, “Munhu yoyose yolonda kuwa wa ichanduso, kolondeka yawe wa ikimambukizo na yawe msang'hanaji wa wose.”

41009037	“Munhu yoyose yombokela mwana mdodo kamba ino kwa twaga jangu, kombokela niye, na munhu yoyose yombokela niye hambokela niye niiyeka vivija kombokela ija yanhumile.”
41009038	Yohana kamulongela Yesu, “Mfundiza, tumona munhu imoja kolava vinyamkela kwa twaga jako. Tweye tumgomesa kwavija siyo miyetu.”
41009039	Yesu kawalongela, “Sekemumgomese, kwavija kuduhu munhu yotenda unzonza kwa twaga jangu na kuno kononga vihile.
41009040	Kwavija munhu yoyose hatulema kaubanzi wetu.
41009041	Nowalongela ukweli munhu yoyose yowagwaa kikasi cha mazi ga kung'wa kwa twaga jangu kwavija mweye mwa wanhu wa Kilisito kobokela nhunza yake.
41009042	“Munhu yoyose yomuhonza imoja wa wadodo wano wonitogola yatende nzambi, yokuwa vinoga munhu ayo yagodekigwe dibwe kulu da kudugila msingo na yasigwe mbahali.
41009043	Kamba mkono wako wahakuhonza utende nzambi, ukanhe! Yokuwa vinoga wingile kuna ugima na mkono umoja, kubanza wingile na makono mabili na abaho uchole jehanamu kuna umoto haufaga.
41009044	Mumo, ‘Funza wowaja hawafa bule na umoto uwalukuza haufaga.’
41009045	Kamba mgulu wako wahakuhonza utende nzambi, ukanhe! Yokuwa vinoga wingile kuna ugima na mgulu umoja, kubanza wingile na magulu gose mabili na abaho wasigwe jehanamu.
41009046	Mumo, ‘Funza wowaja hawafa bule na umoto uwalukuza haufaga.’
41009047	Kamba siso jako dahakuhonza utende nzambi, ding'ole! Yokuwa vinoga wingile Muundewa wa Mulungu na siso dimoja, kubanza wingile na meso gose mabili na abaho wasigwe jehanamu.
41009048	Mumo, ‘Funza wowaja hawafa bule na umoto uwalukuza haufaga.’

41009050	“Mkele unoga, lakini kamba wahagiza ukali wake, vino kodahaze kuubweza kabili? “Muwe na mkele mgati yenu na mukale kwa tindiwalo na waenu.”

41010015	Nowalongeleni ukweli, munhu yoyose yolema kuubokela Undewa wa Mulungu kamba mwana mdodo, honda yengile ng'o.”
41010016	Abaho kawahagatila wana waja kawekila makono gake kawatambikila.

41010019	Kugajuwa Malagizo ga Musa, ‘Sekeukome, sekeutende ugoni, sekewibe, sekeulave usindila wa uvizi, sekeulonge uvizi, wategeleze tatako na mamako.’ ”

41010022	Munhu ija viyahulike avo, kona usungu, kasegela kuno kanyunyuwala kwavija kakala tajili ng'hani.

41010028	Petulo kamulongela, “Lola, tweye tuleka kila kinhu na tukukweleleza gweye.”
41010029	Yesu kawedika, “Nowalongela kweli, munhu yoyose yalekile ng'anda yake hebu ndugu zake hebu lumbu zake hebu mamake hebu tatake hebu wanage hebu migunda mbuli ya niye na kwa Mbuli Inogile,
41010030	kobokela vingi ng'hani mna ikipindi cha sambi. Na kobokela ng'hani miyanza gana, ng'anda na ndugu na lumbu na wana na mama na migunda na hamoja na madununzo na mna ikipindi chondakize kobokela ugima wa mazuwa gose.
41010031	Lakini wanhu wengi weli wa ichanduso wokuwa wa ikimambukizo na waja wa ikimambukizo wokuwa wa ichanduso.”

41010038	Yesu kawalongela, “Hamkijuwile kinhu kimpula. Vino modaha kuking'wela kikasi cha madununzo chonda niking'wele niye? Na kubatizigwa ubatizo unibatizigwa?”
41010039	Wamwidika, “Todaha,” Yesu kawalongela, “Mong'wela kikasi chonda ning'wele niye na kubatizigwa ubatizo wonda nibatizigwe niye.
41010040	Lakini niye nabule udahi wa kusagula nani yakale mwambu wa mkono wangu wa kudila hebu wa kumoso. Mulungu ayo yonda yawagwee hanhu aho, wanhu waja yawasagule.”
41010041	Baho wanahina longo viwahulike vivo wawagevuzikila ng'hani Yakobo na Yohana.
41010042	Yesu kawakema wose hamoja kawalongela, “Mojuwa kamba waja wokoneka wakulu wa isi, wowalanguliza wanhu kwa nguvu, na wakulu wao wana udahi.
41010043	Lakini haili vivo kumwenu. Munhu yoyose yolonda kuwa munhu mkulu, yawe msang'hanaji wa wose.
41010044	Na munhu yoyose yolonda kuwa wa ichanduso, yawe mtumwa wa wose.
41010045	Kwavija Mwana wa Munhu hezile kusang'hanilwa, lakini keza kuwasang'hanila wanhu na kuulava ugima wake kwa kuwakombola wanhu wengi.”
41010046	Wavika Yeliko. Yesu na wanahina zake hamoja na lunhu lwa wanhu viwakalile wosegela, msuwameso imoja yakalile yopula, twaga jake Batumayo, mwanage Timayo kakala mnzila.
41010047	Batumayo viyahulike Yesu wa Nazaleti kobita, kasonga kukemelela, “Yesu, mwanage Daudi nyonele bazi!”
41010048	Wanhu wengi wamkomhokela, wamulongela yanyamale, lakini heyo kagendelela kukemelela ng'hani, “Mwana wa Daudi, nyonele bazi!”
41010049	Yesu kema, kalonga, “Mkemeni.” Avo wamkema, wamulongela, “Gangamala! Ima, kokukema.”
41010050	Kawasa mgolole wake, kazumha kamcholela Yesu.
41010051	Yesu kamuuza, “Kolonda nikutendele choni?” Munhu ayo kamwidika, “Mfundiza, nolonda kulola.”
41010052	Yesu kamulongela, “Chola, kutamanila kwako kukuhonya.” Bahaja kadaha kulola kamkweleleza Yesu mnzila.
41011001	Viwavikile behi na Yelusalemu, habehi na mabuga ga Betifage na Betania kuna Ulugongo lwa Mizeituni, Yesu kawatuma wanahina zake wabili wamulongolele.
41011002	Kawalongela, “Gendeni kuna ikijiji kili kuulongozi wenu, mwahengila momvika mwana mhunda kafungigwa, nayo yang'hali hanakweligwa na munhu. Mfunguleni mumgale hano.
41011003	Munhu yoyose yahawauza habali motenda avo, mulongeleni Mndewa komulonda, nayo kombweza sambi baha.”
41011004	Wanahina waja wachola wamvika mwana mhunda kafungigwa hana ulwivi lwa ng'anda uilola na nzila. Viwakalile womfungula,
41011005	wanhu wemile aho wawauza, “Motenda choni, habali momfungula imhunda?”
41011006	Wawedika kamba Yesu viyawalongele, wanhu waja wawaleka wachole.
41011007	Wamgala imwana mhunda ayo kwa Yesu, watandika viwalo vao mumgongo wa imhunda, Yesu kakwela uchanha.
41011008	Wanhu wengi wanzanza viwalo vao mnzila, na wayagwe wabena mibunho wayanzanza mnzila.
41011009	Wanhu wakalile kukisogo na kuulongozi wa Yesu wakemelela, “Mulungu yatogolwe! Mndewa Mulungu yamtambikile ayo yokwiza kwa twaga jake!
41011010	Mulungu yautambikile undewa ukwiza wa mndewa Daudi, muhenga wetu! Mulungu yeli uchanha ng'hani yatogolwe!”
41011011	Yesu kavika Yelusalemu, kachola kuna Ing'anda ya Mulungu, kawegesela kuno na kuno. Lakini kwavija zuwa dikala dihongile, Yesu kachola Betania na wanahina zake longo na wabili.
41011012	Imitondo yake, viwakalile wosegela Betania, Yesu kakala na nzala.
41011013	Kwa kutali Yesu kawona mbiki wa mtini ukalile na mijani mingi, avo kaucholela yalole kamba kodaha kupata tunda jojose lakini viyavikile honile tunda jojose, ila majani gaiyeka, kwavija haukalile msimu wa kulela.
41011014	Yesu kaulongela mbiki wa mtini, “Munhu sekeyaje tunda jojose kumwako kabili!” Wanahina zake wamuhulika viyalongile vivo.
41011015	Viwavikile Yelusalemu, Yesu kachola kuna Ing'anda ya Mulungu. Kasonga kuwawinga wanhu wose wakalile wogula na kuchuuza vinhu. Kazibidula meza za wanhu wakalile wovunja sente na vigoda va wanhu wakalile wochuuza njiwa.
41011016	Kawagomesa sekewasole kinhu chochose kubitila kuna Ing'anda ya Mulungu.
41011017	Abaho kawafundiza, “Yandikigwa mna Gamaandiko Gang'alile, ‘Ng'anda yangu yokuwa kae ya kupulila kwa wanhu wa isi zose.’ Lakini mweye moitenda mhango ya wabavi!”
41011018	Wakulu wa walava nhosa na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa viwahulike vivo, wasonga kuzahila nzila ya kumkoma Yesu, lakini wamdumba, kwavija lunhu lwa wanhu lukanganya mafundizo gake.
41011019	Viivikile ichungulo, Yesu na wanahina zake wasegela kudibuga.
41011020	Imitootondo yake, viwakalile wobita mnzila wawona mbiki awo wa mtini unyala gogodaa!
41011021	Petulo kakumbuka kija kilawilile, kamulongela Yesu, “Mfundiza, lola, umbiki wa mtini uuduile unyala!”
41011022	Yesu kawedika, “Mumtogole Mulungu.
41011023	Nowalongela ukweli, munhu yoyose yahakilongela kigongo kino, Ng'oka ukayase mbahali na hakona shaka muumoyo wake lakini kotogola kiyolonga cholawilila, na Mulungu komtendela.
41011024	Avo nowalongeleni, mwahampula Mulungu kinhu chochose, togoleni kamba mubokela, mogweleligwa chochose chonda mupule.
41011025	Mwahampula Mulungu geleni kumgongo nzambi ziwawatendele wanhu, muladi Tataenu yeli kuulanga nayo yazigele kumgongo nzambi zenu zimutendile.
41011026	Kamba hamuzigela kumgongo nzambi za wanhu ziwawatendele, na Tataenu yeli kuulanga honda yazigele kumgongo bule nzambi zenu zimutendile.”
41011027	Wavika kabili Yelusalemu, Yesu viyakalile kogenda kuna Ing'anda ya Mulungu, wakulu wa walava nhosa na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na wavele wamcholela,
41011028	wamuuza, “Vino kotenda gano gose kwa udahi gani? Nani yakugwelele udahi wa kutenda gano?”
41011029	Yesu kawedika, “Na niye nowauza mbuli imoja, mwahanidika, baho nowalongeleni notenda gano kwa udahi gani.
41011030	Nongeleni, udahi wa Yohana wa kubatiza ulawa kwa Mulungu hebu kwa wanhu?”
41011031	Wasonga kuilongela, “Twahalonga, ‘Ulawa kwa Mulungu,’ kotuuza, ‘Habali hamumtogole Yohana?’
41011032	Lakini twahalonga, ‘Ulawa kwa wanhu,’” wawadumba wanhu, kwavija wanhu wamtogola Yohana kamba mtula ndagu wa Mulungu.
41011033	Avo wamwidika, “Tweye hatujuwile.” Yesu kawalongela, “Na niye siwalongela bule kwa udahi gani notenda gano.”
41012001	Yesu kalonga nao kwa simo, “Munhu imoja kahanda mizabibu mumgunda wake. Kazungulusila lwigo mumgunda wake, kahimba hanhu ha kukamila zabibu, kazenga lingo. Abaho kawakodisha walimaji, kafunga mwanza kachola.
41012002	Msimu wa kubawa zabibu viuvikile, kamtuma msang'hanaji kwa awo walimaji yamgalile zabibu kulawa mumgunda wake.
41012003	Lakini walimaji awo wamgoga, wamtowa, wamuwinga makono gaiyeka.
41012004	Abaho kamtuma msang'hanaji iyagwe, ayo nayo wamtowa mdipala na wamgela kinyala.
41012005	Mwene mgunda kamtuma msang'hanaji iyagwe, nayo wamkoma, na kawatuma wayagwe wengi wawatendela vivo, wayagwe wawatowa na wayagwe wawakoma.
41012006	Kakala kasigala na munhu imoja wa kumtuma, nayo kakala mwanage yamnogele ng'hani. Kamtuma kuno kolonga, ‘Womtegeleza mwanangu.’
41012007	Lakini walimaji wailongela, ‘Ino ayo muhazi, lekeni tumkome tusole uhazi wake!’
41012008	Avo wamgoga, wamkoma wamwasa kunze ya umgunda wa imizabibu.”
41012009	Yesu kawauza, “Vino mwene mgunda kotendaze? Kokwiza kuwakoma walimaji wose na kowakodisha walimaji wayagwe mgunda awo wa mizabibu.
41012010	Hamgasomile Maandiko Gang'alile vigalonga, ‘Dibwe wadilemile wazengaji, Sambi digalamuka dibwe kulu kubanza gose.
41012011	Mbuli ino itendigwa na Mndewa, nayo yotukanganya!’ ”
41012012	Walangulizi wa Wayahudi walonda kumgoga Yesu, kwavija wajuwa lusimo luno kawalonga wao. Lakini waludumba lunhu lwa wanhu, avo wamuleka wasegela.
41012013	Mafalisayo wayagwe na wanhu wa Helode wakala watumigwe kwa Yesu, wamgoge kwa mbuli zake.
41012014	Wamcholela wamulongela, “Mfundiza, tokujuwa gweye kwa munhu ulonga ukweli, humdumba munhu yoyose, hutonga ukulu wa munhu. Lakini gweye kofundiza goyolonda Mulungu wanhu wagatende. Tulongele, vino vinoga kulipa kodi kwa Mndewa wa Lumi hebu havinogile bule? Tulipe hebu seketulipe?”
41012015	Lakini Yesu kaujuwa ubala wao kawauza, “Habali monigeza? Ngalileni isente niilole.”
41012016	Wamgalila isente, nayo kawauza, “Vino kihanga kino cha nani? Na twaga dino da nani?” Wamwidika, “Va Mndewa wa Lumi.”
41012017	Yesu kawalongela, “Mgweleleni Mndewa wa Lumi vili va Mndewa wa Lumi, na mgweleleni Mulungu vili va Mulungu.” Nao wamkanganya Yesu.
41012018	Abaho Masadukayo, wanhu wolonga kuduhu kuzilibuka kulawa kwa wafile. Wayagwe wamcholela Yesu wamulongela,
41012019	“Mfundiza, Musa katwandikila, ‘Munhu yahafa na kuleka mwehe wake bila wana, ndugu yake munhu ayo kolondeka yamsole mgane ayo, yamulelele ndugu yake yafile wana.’
41012020	Kukala na ndugu saba, ija imkulu kasola mwehe kafa halekile wana.
41012021	Wakabili nayo kamuhala mgane ayo nayo vivija kafa halekile wana. Vivija kwa wakadatu kafa halekile wana.
41012022	Abaho kwa wayagwe, wose saba wamsolile mgane ayo wafa hawalekile wana. Ako kumwande, mtwanzi ayo nayo kafa.
41012023	Avo, wanhu wose wafile wahazilibuka mwiisiku ya kuzilibuka, mtwanzi ayo kokuwa mwehe wa nani? Kwavija wose saba wakala wamsolile.”
41012024	Yesu kawedika, “Mweye mopotela! Kwavija hamugajuwile Maandiko Gang'alile hebu udahi wa Mulungu.
41012025	Kwavija wanhu wafile vonda wazilibuke, hawasola wala hawasoligwa wokuwa kamba wasenga wa kuulanga.
41012026	Kwa mbuli ya kuzilibuka kwa wanhu wafile, hamusomile mna ikitabu cha Musa mbuli ya kisolo kikwaka? Mulungu kamulongela Musa, ‘Niye na Mulungu wa Abulahamu na wa Isaka na wa Yakobo.’
41012027	Heyo heli Mulungu wa wanhu wafile, ila Mulungu wa wanhu wagima. Avo mweye mopotela ng'hani!”
41012028	Mfundiza Malagizo ga Musa imoja yakalile aho kahulika viwaibamilile. Kona kamba Yesu kawedika goya Masadukayo, avo kamkwesela Yesu kamuuza, “Mna ga Malagizo gose lagizo gani dili kulu?”
41012029	Yesu kamwidika, “Lagizo dili kulu ijo dino, ‘Tegelezeni mweye wanhu wa Izilaeli! Mndewa Mulungu wetu ayo Mndewa yaiyeka.
41012030	Mnogele Mndewa Mulungu wako kwa moyo wako wose, kwa loho yako yose, kwa nzewele zako zose, na kwa nguvu zako zose.’
41012031	Lagizo da kabili kwa ukulu ijo dino, ‘Mnogele miyago kamba viuinogela mwenyego.’ Kuduhu lagizo diyagwe kulu kubanza gano mabili.”
41012032	Mfundiza Malagizo ga Musa kamtogola Yesu, “Mfundiza, kwidika goya viulongile, Mndewa ayo Mulungu na kuduhu iyagwe ila heyo.
41012033	Kumnogela Mulungu wako kwa moyo wako wose na kwa nzewele zako zose na kwa nguvu zako, na kumnogela miyago kamba viuinogela mwenyego, kunoga ng'hani kugoga Malagizo gano mabili kubanza kumulavila Mulungu nhosa za wanyama na nhosa ziyagwe.”
41012034	Yesu viyonile munhu ayo kedika goya, kamulongela, “Huli kutali na Undewa wa Mulungu.” Kusongela aho haduhu munhu yoyose yagezile kumuuza Yesu mbuli yoyose.
41012035	Yesu viyakalile kofundiza Mng'anda ya Mulungu, kawauza, “Habali wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wolonga Kilisito Mkombola mwana wa Daudi?
41012036	Loho Yang'alile kamulongoza Daudi kulonga, ‘Mndewa Mulungu kamulongela Mndewa wangu, Kala hano hana mwambu wa mkono wangu wa kudila mbaka niweke hasi mmagulu gako wanhu wakwihile.’
41012037	“Avo Daudi mwenyego kamkema, ‘Mndewa.’ Avo Kilisito Mkombola kodahaze kuwa mwana wa Daudi?” Lunhu lwa wanhu lukala lumtegeleza Yesu kwa kudeng'helela.
41012038	Viyakalile kofundiza, kawalongela, “Muiteganye na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa, wonogelwa kugenda kuno wovala mikanzu mitali na kulamusigwa na wanhu mna gamagulilo,
41012039	wosagula vigoda va haulongozi mzing'anda za kumpula Mulungu na kukala hanhu hanogile mna izinyimwili nyimwili.
41012040	Wowaboka wagane vinhu na kusola ng'anda zao, abaho woilagusa wanoga kwa kumpula Mulungu mbuli nyingi. Nhaguso yao yokuwa ng'hulu!”
41012041	Yesu kakala behi na kigelo cha kulavila sadaka hana Ing'anda ya Mulungu, kawalola wanhu viwolava sente mkigelo. Matajili wengi walava sente nyingi.
41012042	Abaho keza mgane mkiwa kalava sente mbili ndodo.
41012043	Yesu kawakema wanahina zake kawalongela, “Nowalongela ukweli mgane mkiwa ino kalava sente nyingi mna ikigelo cha sadaka kubanza wose wayagwe.
41012044	Kwavija wose walava vija visigale muutajili wao, lakini mgane ino hamoja na ukiwa wake kalava vose viyelinavo.”
41013001	Yesu viyakalile kosegela kuna Ing'anda ya Mulungu, mwanahina wake imoja kamulongela, “Mfundiza, lola mabwe gano na ng'anda zino vizinogile!”
41013002	Yesu kamwidika, “Kozona ng'anda zino vizili ng'hulu? Haduhu dibwe donda dilekigwe uchanha ya diyagwe, kila dibwe dokwasigwa hasi.”
41013003	Yesu viyakalile kuna Ulugongo lwa Mizeituni, mwambu kwa mwambu na Ng'anda ya Mulungu, baho Petulo na Yakobo na Yohana na Andeleya wamcholela Yesu kinyelegezi.
41013004	Wamulongela, “Tulongele, choni chonda kitendeke kulagusa kipindi cha kulawilila gano gose?”
41013005	Yesu kawalongela, “Muiteganye, munhu yoyose sekeyawavizile.
41013006	Wanhu wengi, wokwiza kwa twaga jangu na kulonga, ‘Nene iyo heyo!’ Nao wowavizila wanhu wengi.
41013007	Mwahahulika mbuli za ng'hondo kutali na mbuli za ng'hondo mmabehi, sekemudumbe, kwavija gano gose golondigwa galawilile, ila kimambukizo king'hali hakinavika.
41013008	Isi yoitowa na isi iyagwe, undewa woitowa na undewa uyagwe. Kila hanhu hokuwa na mitigisiko mikulu ya isi na lufilili lwa nzala. Gano gose kamba mwanduso wa usungu wa kulela mwana.
41013009	“Na mweye muiteganye. Mogogigwa na kugaligwa mkitala. Motoigwa mna izing'anda za kumpula Mulungu, mogaligwa haulongozi wa wakulu wa isi na wandewa mbuli ya niye, muladi muwalongele Mbuli Inogile.
41013010	Lakini kimambukizo king'hali hakinavika, Mbuli Inogile tanhu yolondeka ipetigwe kwa wanhu wose.
41013011	Mwahagogigwa na kugaligwa mkitala, sekemunyawenyawe mbuli ya kulonga. Kipindi chahavika longeni chochose chonda mugweleligwe. Kwavija mbuli zonda mulonge hazili zenu, ila zolawa kwa Loho Yang'alile.
41013012	Munhu komuhinduka ndugu yake too yakomigwe, na tata komuhinduka mwanage yakomigwe. Wana wowahinduka tata zao na mama zao wakomigwe.
41013013	Wanhu wose wowehila mweye mbuli ya niye, lakini yoyose yonda yafunge umoyo mbaka kukimambukizo kokomboligwa.
41013014	“Vondamuchone, ‘Kinhu kinyolodoke kigala Ubananzi’ kima hanhu si hake. Munhu yosoma yavijuwe, waja weli mwiisi ya Yudea wakimbilile kuna ivigongo.
41013015	Munhu yeli mkiswili cha ng'anda yake sekeyahumuluke hasi mna ing'anda yake kusola kinhu.
41013016	Yeli kumgunda sekeyabwele ukae kusola kiwalo chake.
41013017	Wogaya watwanzi wali na zinda na waja wokong'heza mna izisiku azo.
41013018	Mpuleni Mulungu mbuli zino sekezilawilile mna ikipindi cha kihuhwe!
41013019	Kwavija siku azo hokuwa na magayo makulu, haganalawila kulawa kuna ichanduso Mulungu viyaumbile isi mbaka sambi na honda galawilile kabili.
41013020	Lakini Mulungu kazihunguza siku zizo, maza hazihunguze sambi yahone munhu yoyose. Lakini mbuli ya wanhu zake yawasagule, Mulungu kazihunguza siku zizo.
41013021	“Avo, munhu yoyose yahawalongela, ‘Amweye, Kilisito kahano!’ hebu ‘Kahaja!’ sekemumtogolele.
41013022	Kwavija wolawilila makilisito na watula ndagu wa uvizi. Wotenda unzonza na vilaguso muladi yahadahika wawavizile hata waja wasaguligwe na Mulungu.
41013023	Muiteganye! Niye niwalongela kila kinhu kipindi king'hali hakinavika.
41013024	“Gahamala magayo ga siku azo, zuwa dokuwa ziza, na mwezi honda umwemwese bule,
41013025	nhondo zolagala kulawa kuulanga, na vinhu vili kuulanga votigisika.
41013026	Abaho Mwana wa Munhu kolawilila, kokwiza mna gamawingu kwa nguvu ng'hulu na ukulu.
41013027	Abaho kowatuma wasenga zake wa kuulanga mna izibanzi nne za mwiisi, waweke hamoja wanhu wasaguligwe na Mulungu kulawa mwambu uno wa isi na uyagwe.
41013028	“Ifunzeni kubitila mbiki wa mtini. Matambi gake gahasonga kuzuka na kwika majani, mujuwe kamba vuli da mmabehi.
41013029	Vivija, mwahazona mbuli azo, mojuwa kamba kammabehi kwiza.
41013030	Nowalongeleni ukweli, wanhu wa lukolo luno hawafa wose mbaka gano gose galawilile.
41013031	Ulanga na isi vobita, lakini mbuli zangu hondazibite ng'o.
41013032	“Kuduhu yaijuwile siku hebu saa ya kwiza, siyo wasenga wa kuulanga wala Mwana, lakini Tata yaiyeka ayo yaijuwile.
41013033	Muiteganye, na mukale meso, kwavija Hamkijuwile kipindi chonda yeze.
41013034	Yokuwa kamba munhu yofunga mwanza na kuwaleka wasang'hanaji zake walolese goya vinhu, kila munhu kamgwaa sang'hano yakutenda. Kamulagiza mkalizi wa mulango yakale meso.
41013035	Muiteganye, kwavija hamujuwile kipindi cha kwiza mkulu wa ng'anda, yodaha kuwa ichungulo, kilo kikulu, nzogolo zikwika, hebu imitondo.
41013036	Yaheza kwa kuwasinhusa, sekeyawavike muwasile.
41013037	Mbuli iniwalongele mweye, nowalongela wanhu wose, kaleni meso!”
41014001	Zikala zisigale siku mbili ivike Nyimwili nyimwili ya Pasaka na Magate haganageligwa usasu. Wakulu wa walava nhosa na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wakala wozahila nzila ya kumgoga Yesu wamkome.
41014002	Walonga, “Seketutende avo kipindi cha Nyimwili nyimwili ya Pasaka, buleavo wanhu woding'huka.”
41014003	Yesu kakala Betania mng'anda ya Simoni, munhu yakalile na utamu wa dikulu. Viyakalile koja, mtwanzi imoja keza na nyhupa ya alabasita imemile mavuta gonung'hila goya ga bei ng'hulu. Kaifungula, kamgidila Yesu ga mavuta mdipala.
41014004	Wanhu wayagwe wakalile aho wagevuzika, wailongela, “Unanzi gani uno wa mavuta!”
41014005	Abaho wamkomhokela mtwanzi ayo, walonga, “Mavuta gano gahauzigwe kwa sente magana madatu na zisente wagweleligwe wakiwa!”
41014006	Lakini Yesu kawalongela, “Mulekeni, habali momgaza mtwanzi ino? Niye kanhendela mbuli inogile.
41014007	Wanhu wakiwa mokala nao siku zose, saa yoyose mwahalonda modaha kuwataza. Lakini honda mukale na niye siku zose.
41014008	Mtwanzi ino katenda viyadahile, kalongola kulubakaza lukuli lwangu mavuta ganogile, kulutanda kwa kuzikigwa.
41014009	Nowalongeleni ukweli, kokose konda ipetigwe Mbuli Inogile mwiisi, kino kiyatendile mtwanzi ino cholongigwa, avo wanhu womkumbuka.”
41014010	Abaho imoja wa wanahina zake longo na wabili yakemigwe Yuda Isikaliote, kachola kwa wakulu wa walava nhosa yamuhinduke Yesu kumwao.
41014011	Avo viwahulike kiyalongile wadeng'helela, na wailagana nayo kumgwaa sente. Avo Yuda kasonga kuzahila nzila ya kumgela Yesu mmakono gao.
41014012	Mna isiku ya ichanduso ya Nyimwili nyimwili ya Magate hagageligwe Usasu, siku dijo mwana ng'hondolo wa Pasaka kochinjigwa, wanahina zake Yesu wamuuza, “Kolonda tuchole kwahi tukutandile lujo lwa Pasaka?”
41014013	Yesu kawatuma wanahina zake wabili kawalongela, “Gendeni kudibuga, momting'hana mbigalo kaidikwa nongo ya mazi. Mkwelelezeni,
41014014	mbaka mng'anda yonda yengile, mulongeleni mwene kae, ‘Mfundiza kolonga, da kwahi gati da kudila lujo lwa Pasaka niye na wanahina zangu?’
41014015	Nayo kowalagusila gati kulu dili uchanha dikigwa goya na dihambigwa. Mumo tutandileni.”
41014016	Wanahina zake wasegela, wachola kudibuga, wavika kila kinhu vivija viyawalongele Yesu, avo wamtandila lujo lwa Pasaka.
41014017	Viivikile ichungulo, Yesu kavika na wanahina zake longo na wabili.
41014018	Viwakalile woja, Yesu kalonga, “Nowalongeleni imoja wenu yoja na niye, konihinduka.”
41014019	Wanahina zake wanyawanyawa, wamuuza, imoja imoja, “Vino gweye kolonga niye?”
41014020	Yesu kawedika, “Imoja wenu mweye longo na wabili, yozanhika gate jake hamoja na niye mbakuli.
41014021	Mwana wa Munhu kofa kamba Maandiko Gang'alile vigolonga. Lakini kogaya munhu ija yomuhinduka Mwana wa Munhu. Yahanogile ng'hani kamba munhu ayo sambi yavumbuke!”
41014022	Viwakalile woja, Yesu kasola gate, kamgwaa nhogolwa Mulungu, kadibanzula na kawagwaa wanahina zake kalonga, “Soleni, uno ulo lukuli lwangu.”
41014023	Abaho kasola kikasi cha divai, kamgwaa nhogolwa Mulungu, kawagwaa wanahina zake, wose waking'wela.
41014024	Yesu kalonga, “Ino ayo damu yangu ilagusa lagano da Mulungu, ikwitika mbuli ya wanhu wengi.
41014025	Nowalongela, kusongela sambi honda ning'we kabili divai, mbaka siku dijo donda ning'we divai ya sambi Muundewa wa Mulungu.”
41014026	Abaho wemba lwila, wachola kuna Ulugongo lwa Mizeituni.
41014027	Yesu kawalongela, “Mweye mose mokimbila na kundeka niiyeka, kwavija Maandiko Gang'alile golonga, ‘Mulungu komtowa msusilaji, na ng'hondolo wose wopwililika.’
41014028	Lakini nahazilibuka, nowalongolela kuchola Galilaya.”
41014029	Petulo kamwidika Yesu, “Hata kamba wose wahakuleka, niye sikuleka bule!”
41014030	Yesu kamulongela Petulo, “Nokulongela ukweli, kilo cha lelo nzogolo yang'hali hana kwika miyanza mibili, konibela miyanza midatu.”
41014031	Petulo kagangamiza kulonga, “Silonga vivo bule, hata kamba nahafa na gweye!” Na wanahina wayagwe walonga vivo.
41014032	Yesu na wanahina zake wavika hanhu hokemigwa Getisemane, Yesu kawalongela, “Kaleni hano, niye nogenda kumpula Mulungu.”
41014033	Kawasola Petulo na Yakobo na Yohana. Yesu kona usungu na kanyunyuwala.
41014034	Kawalongela wanahina zake, “Usungu uli muumoyo wangu mkulu ng'hani wodaha kung'homa. Kaleni hano meso.”
41014035	Kachola kumwande kidogo, kaibwanha hasi, kampula Mulungu, kamba yahadahika sekeyaibitile saa ayo ya madununzo.
41014036	Kampula Mulungu, “Tata! Kumwako gose godahika. Ukisegeze kikasi kino cha madununzo. Lakini siyo kamba vinilonda niye ila viulonda gweye.”
41014037	Abaho kabwela kawavika wanahina zake wadatu wawasa. Kamulongela Petulo, “Simoni kuwasa? Vino hamudahile kukala meso hata saa dimoja?”
41014038	Kawalongela, “Kaleni meso, mumpule Mulungu sekemwingile mna ukugezigwa. Moyo wa munhu wolonda kutenda ganogile, lakini lukuli lwaduhu nguvu.”
41014039	Kachola lwa kabili kumpula Mulungu, kalonga mbuli zizija.
41014040	Viyabwelile kabili, kawavika wanahina zake wawasa, kwavija meso gao gakala na utulo. Hawaijuwile mbuli yakumulongela Yesu.
41014041	Viyabwelile mwanza wa kadatu, kawalongela, “Mung'hali muwasa na kubwihila? Yotosha! Kipindi kivika! Loleni, Mwana wa Munhu kogeligwa mmakono ga wanhu wene nzambi.
41014042	Lamukeni, tuchole. Loleni munhu yonihinduka kavika!”
41014043	Yesu viyakalile yang'hali yogendelela kulonga, imoja wa wanahina zake longo na wabili, yakemigwe Yuda Isikaliote kavika. Keza na lunhu lutumigwe na wakulu wa walava nhosa, wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na wavele, kuno wapapa mapanga na malungu.
41014044	Yuda Isikaliote yomuhinduka Yesu kawagwaa kilaguso, kawalongela, “Munhu yonda nimnonele ayo yummulonda. Mgogeni mumgele mmakono genu.”
41014045	Bahaja Yuda kamcholela Yesu kamulongela, “Mfundiza!” Abaho kamnonela.
41014046	Avo wamgoga Yesu wamgodeka.
41014047	Lakini imoja wa waja wakalile na Yesu, kasomola panga jake, kamkanha digwiti msang'hanaji wa Mkulu wa walava nhosa.
41014048	Yesu kawalongela, “Vino habali mwizile kungoga na mapanga na malungu kamba vija nambavi?
41014049	Kila siku ng'hala na mweye, nowafundiza kuna Ing'anda ya Mulungu, hamnigogile. Lakini gano gatendeka muladi Maandiko Gang'alile galawilile.”
41014050	Abaho wanahina wose wamuleka wakimbila.
41014051	Mbwanga imoja yavalile mgolole wiiyeka, kakala yomkweleleza Yesu. Walonda kumgoga,
41014052	lakini kauleka mgolole wake, kakimbila mwazi.
41014053	Abaho Yesu kagaligwa mng'anda ya Mkulu wa walava nhosa, mumo wakulu wa walava nhosa wose, wavele na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa waiting'hana.
41014054	Petulo kamkweleleza Yesu kwa kutali, kengila muuluwa lwa mkulu wa walava nhosa, kakala hasi na wakalizi, kokotela moto.
41014055	Wakulu wa walava nhosa na wanhu wose wa mkitala wazahila usindila wa uvizi muladi wamkome Yesu, lakini hawaupatile bule.
41014056	Wanhu wengi walonga mbuli za uvizi kwa Yesu, lakini usindila wao hauwilumbile.
41014057	Abaho wanhu wayagwe wema walonga mbuli za uvizi kwa Yesu.
41014058	Walonga, “Tumuhulika kolonga, ‘Noibomola Ng'anda ino ya Mulungu izengigwe na wanhu, na kwa siku ndatu noizenga iyagwe haizengigwe na wanhu.’ ”
41014059	Na awo vivija usindila wao hauwilumbile.
41014060	Mkulu wa walava nhosa kenuka mgameso ga wanhu kamuuza Yesu, “Vino kuduhu mbuli ya kwidika kwa kitala choolava wanhu wano?”
41014061	Lakini Yesu kanyamala tuluu, halongile mbuli, Mkulu wa walava nhosa kamuuza kabili, “Gweye ayo Kilisito Mkombola, Mwana wa ija Yotogoligwa?”
41014062	Yesu kamwidika, “Nene iyo heyo. Mweye momona Mwana wa Munhu kakala muukulu mwambu wa mkono wa kudila wa Mulungu yeli na Udahi, kokwiza mna gamawingu ga kuulanga!”
41014063	Mkulu wa walava nhosa kakidega kiwalo chake, kalonga, “Hatulonda usindila uyagwe!
41014064	Muhulika viyomuliga Mulungu. Mweye mogesaze?” Wose walonga, kabananga kolondeka yakomigwe.
41014065	Wanhu wayagwe wamtemela mate Yesu, wamgubika gameso, wamtowa na wamulongela, “Lagula, nani yakutowile!” Abaho wakalizi wamsola wamtowa ng'hofi.
41014066	Petulo viyakalile yang'hali hasi muuluwa, msang'hanaji imoja wa kitwanzi wa mkulu wa walava nhosa kamcholela.
41014067	Viyamone Petulo kokotela moto, kamulola bunhuu kamulongela, “Gweye vivija kukala hamoja na Yesu wa Nazaleti.”
41014068	Petulo kabela, “Bule, sijuwile kiulonga.” Abaho Petulo kalawa kunze mbaka kuna uluhelengo. Bahaja nzogolo keka.
41014069	Msang'hanaji ija wa kitwanzi kamona Petulo, kawalongela wanhu wemile aho, “Ino nayo imoja wao!”
41014070	Lakini Petulo kabela kabili. Hamwande kidogo wanhu wakalile wemile aho wamulongela Petulo kabili, “Gweye vivija kwa imoja wao, kwavija kwa mwenekae wa Galilaya.”
41014071	Petulo kalonga, “Mulungu kojuwa nolonga ukweli, niduiligwe nahalonga uvizi, simjuwile munhu yumulonga!”
41014072	Bahaja nzogolo keka mwanza wa kabili, baho Petulo kakumbuka mbuli ziyalongeligwe na Yesu, “Nzogolo yang'hali hanakwika miyanza mibili, konibela miyanza midatu.” Avo Petulo kasonga kulila.
41015001	Imitootondo, wakulu wa walava nhosa, wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa, wavele na wanhu wose wa mkitala waiting'hana, waitogolela kumgala Yesu kwa Pilato. Wamgodeka nzabi, wamgala kwa Pilato.
41015002	Pilato kamuuza Yesu, “Gweye ayo Mndewa wa Wayahudi?” Yesu kamwidika, “Ona, vivo viulonga.”
41015003	Wakulu wa walava nhosa wamulavila Yesu vitala vingi,
41015004	avo Pilato kamuuza Yesu kabili, “Hulonda kwidika? Tegeleza viwokulavila vitala!”
41015005	Lakini Yesu hedike mbuli yoyose, Pilato kakanganya.
41015006	Yahavikaga Nyimwili nyimwili ya Pasaka Pilato kamfungulilaga mfungwa imoja wamulondile wanhu.
41015007	Mna ikipindi acho kukala na munhu imoja twaga jake Balaba, kakala yagodekigwe mkifungo na wayage, mbuli ya ukomaji kipindi wanhu viwading'huke.
41015008	Lunhu lwa wanhu viluiting'hane, lumpula Pilato yawatendele kamba viyatendaga.
41015009	Pilato kawauza, “Molonda niwafungulileni mndewa wa Wayahudi?”
41015010	Pilato kajuwa goya kamba wakulu wa walava nhosa wamgela Yesu mmakono gake kwavija wamonela migongo.
41015011	Lakini wakulu wa walava nhosa wawading'hula wanhu wampule Pilato yawafungulile Balaba.
41015012	Pilato kaluuza kabili lunhu luja, “Vino molonda nhende choni kwa munhu ino yumumkema mndewa wa Wayahudi?”
41015013	Wanhu wose wakemelela, “Muwambe mumsalaba!”
41015014	Pilato kawauza, “Vino kabananga choni?” Awo wagendelela kukemelela, “Muwambe mumsalaba!”
41015015	Pilato kalonda kulunogeza lunhu lwa wanhu, avo kamfungulila Balaba mkifungo. Abaho kalagiza Yesu yatoigwe mbalati na yawambigwe mumsalaba.
41015016	Wakalizi wamgala Yesu muuluwa lwa ng'anda ya mkulu wa isi, waiting'hana na wayao wose.
41015017	Wamvaza kiwalo cha Undewa, waluka ngata ya miba, waika mdipala jake.
41015018	Wamulamusa, “Mwinyi, Mndewa wa Wayahudi!”
41015019	Wamtowa mbalati mdipala wamtemela mate, wamfugamila na kumwinamila.
41015020	Viwamambukize kumzeha, wamvula ikiwalo cha Undewa wamvaza viwalo vake. Abaho wamulava kunze wamuwambe mumsalaba.
41015021	Viwakalile mnzila wamting'hana munhu imoja twaga jake Simoni, mwenekae wa Kilene, tatao Alekizanda na Lufo. Kipindi acho kakala kolawa kumgunda, wakalizi wamnanahiza yaupape msalaba wa Yesu.
41015022	Wamgala Yesu mbaka hanhu hokemigwa Goligota, fambulo jake, “Hanhu ha Fumvu da Pala.”
41015023	Wamgwaa Yesu divai ihanganyigwe na kinhu kili usungu, lakini Yesu kalema kung'wa.
41015024	Abaho wamuwamba Yesu mumsalaba, waigolela viwalo vake, kwa kubwanha simbi, ili yajuwike simbi yomgwila nani avo yasole ikiwalo.
41015025	Ikala saa ndatu imitondo viwamuwambile Yesu mumsalaba.
41015026	Wandika kilamuso cha kutagusigwa kwake, chandikigwa vino, “Mndewa wa Wayahudi.”
41015027	Vivija wawawamba wabavi wabili hamoja na Yesu, imoja mwambu wake wa mkono wa kudila na iyagwe mwambu wake wa kumoso.
41015028	Avo galawilila Maandiko Gang'alile galongile, “Kekigwa hamoja na wanhu watendile gehile.”
41015029	Wabita nzila watigisa mapala gao wamuliga Yesu, walonga, “Gweye kulonga koibomola Ng'anda ya Mulungu na kuizenga kabili kwa siku ndatu!
41015030	Lelo humuluka mumsalaba uikombole mwenyego!”
41015031	Vivija wakulu wa walava nhosa na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wamzeha Yesu walonga, “Kawakombola wayagwe, lakini hadaha kuikombola mwenyego!

41015033	Viivikile saa sita imisi, isi yose ikala igubikigwe na ziza totolo, ziza dijo dikala kwa masaa madatu.
41015034	Viivikile saa tisa imisi, Yesu kalila kwa sauti ng'hulu, “Eloi, Eloi, lama, sabakitani?” Fambulo jake, “Mulungu wangu, Mulungu wangu, habali kundeka?”

41015037	Yesu kalila kwa sauti ng'hulu, abaho kafa.
41015038	Panziya da Ng'anda ya Mulungu digola gati da Ng'anda ya Mulungu na hanhu hong'ala ng'hani, didegeka mhande mbili, kulawa uchanha mbaka hasi.

41015040	Baho kukala na watwanzi wayagwe wakalile wolola kwa kutali. Mna iwao kakala Malia Magidalena, Malia mamao Yakobo mdodo na Yusufu na Salome.
41015041	Watwanzi awo wamkweleleza Yesu viyakalile Galilaya na kumsang'hanila. Watwanzi wayagwe wezile nayo Yelusalemu vivija wakala aho.
41015042	Viivikile ichungulo ing'hali hainavika siku ya Kubwihila. Wayahudi wakala woitanda kwa siku ayo ya Kubwihila.
41015043	Yusufu mwenekae wa Alimataya, imoja wa wakulu wa Mkitala cha Wayahudi yategelezigwe ng'hani kavika. Munhu ino kakala kobetela kwiza kwa Undewa wa Mulungu. Avo kamgendela Pilato bila kudumba, kampula yamgwee lukuli lwa Yesu.
41015044	Pilato kakanganya kuhulika Yesu kafa. Kamkema mkulu wa wakalizi kamuuza kamba Yesu kakala yafile mwaka.
41015045	Pilato viyalongeligwe avo na mkulu wa wakalizi kamba Yesu kafa, kamulongela Yusufu yalusole lukuli lwa Yesu.
41015046	Yusufu kagula sitili, kaluhumulusa lukuli lwa Yesu, kaluzingiliza sitili kalwika mdipanga disongoligwe mdibwe. Abaho kabimbilisa dibwe kulu kadigubika mmulomo wa dipanga.
41015047	Malia Magidalena na Malia mamake Yusufu wahona hanhu halwikigwe lukuli lwa Yesu.
41016001	Viimalile siku ya Kubwihila, Malia Magidalena, Malia mamake Yakobo na Salome wagula mavuta gonung'hila goya wachola kulubakaza lukuli lwa Yesu.
41016002	Imitootondo ng'hani mna isiku ya jumapili, zuwa vidisongile kulawa wachola kudipanga.
41016003	Viwakalile mnzila wailongela, “Nani yonda yatubimbilisile idibwe hamgwazo wa umulomo wa dipanga?”
41016004	Lakini viwalolile wona dibwe dija dibimbilisigwa mwaka hamgwazo. Dikala dibwe kulu ng'hani.
41016005	Avo wengila mdipanga, wamona mbwanga imoja yavalile kiwalo kizelu, kakala mkono wa kudila, wadumba ng'hani.
41016006	Kawalongela, “Sekemudumbe nojuwa momzahila Yesu wa Nazaleti yawambigwe mumsalaba. Kahaduhu hano, kazilibuka! Loleni hanhu hawamwikile.

41016008	Avo walawa mdipanga, kuno wogwaya na kudumba, wakimbila. Hawamulongele munhu yoyose mbuli ino kwavija wakala wodumba.
41016009	Yesu viyazilibuke mwiisiku ya Jumapili imitootondo, tanhu kamulawilila Malia Magidalena, ija yamulavile vinyamkela saba.

41016015	Kawalongela, “Choleni mwiisi yose mukawapetele wanhu wose Mbuli Inogile.

41016018	wahagoga mizoka hebu wahang'wa sumu hondawatendigwe kinhu chochose kihile, wowekila wanhu watamu makono gao, nao wohona.”
41016019	Mndewa Yesu viyamambukize kulonga na wanahina zake, kagaligwa kuulanga, kakala muukulu mwambu wa mkono wa kudila wa Mulungu.
41016020	Abaho wanahina zake wachola kila hanhu kuwapetela wanhu Mbuli Inogile. Na Mndewa kasang'hana nao na unzonza wautendile ulagusa kamba usenga wao ukala wa ukweli.
42001001	Mkulu Teofili, Wanhu wengi wawamba ng'hani kwandika mbuli zija zilawilile kumwetu.
42001002	Wandika mbuli zija zitulongeligwe na wanhu waja wazonile kwa meso gao kusongela kuna ichanduso na wapetile uusenga.
42001003	Avo go mkulu, kwavija nizizahila vinogile mbuli zino kulawa kuna ichanduso, vinikona niye yokuwa vinoga kukwandikila goya mbuli zija zilawilile.
42001004	Notenda vino muladi ujuwe ukweli wose wa mbuli ziufundizigwe.
42001005	Kipindi acho Helode viyakalile mndewa wa Yudea, kukala na mulava nhosa, twaga jake Zakalia, wa kibumbila cha Abiya. Mwehe wake kakala Elizabeti, nayo vivija kalawa mulukolo lwa mulava nhosa Haluni.
42001006	Wose wabili wakala wotenda ganogile mgameso ga Mulungu, na kugagoga Malagizo gose ga Mndewa Mulungu.
42001007	Wakala waduhu wana kwavija Elizabeti kakala mgumba, na wose wabili wakala wavele.
42001008	Siku dimoja Zakalia kakala Mng'anda ya Mulungu yosang'hana isang'hano yake ya kulava nhosa, kamba viyatendaga mna izamu yake.
42001009	Zakalia kasaguligwa kwa kubwanha simbi, kamba viwatendaga walava nhosa, kwingila Mng'anda ya Mndewa yasome ubani.
42001010	Kipindi cha kusoma ubani vikivikile, wanhu wengi wakala kunze wompula Mulungu.
42001011	Msenga wa kuulanga wa Mndewa kamulawilila Zakalia, kema mwambu wa mkono wa kudila wa upango wa kusomela ubani.
42001012	Zakalia viyamone, kasinhuka na kagwaya kwa bwembwe.
42001013	Lakini msenga wa kuulanga kamulongela, “Sekeudumbe, Zakalia! Mulungu kahulika kupula kwako. Mwehe wako Elizabeti kokulelela mwana wa kimbigalo, twaga jake komkema Yohana.
42001014	Kodeng'helela ng'hani na wanhu wengi wodeng'helela kwa kuvumbuka kwake.
42001015	Kokuwa munhu mkulu mgameso ga Mndewa. Honda yang'we ugimbi hebu divai. Kokuwa na Loho Yang'alile kusongela mna iinda ya mamake.
42001016	Kowatenda wanhu wengi wa Izilaeli wailumbe na Mndewa Mulungu wao.
42001017	Nayo komulongolela Mndewa, kokuwa na nguvu kamba mtula ndagu wa Mulungu Eliya. Kowatenda tata na wana wainogele, kowagalusa wanhu waja hawamtegeleza Mulungu wagese ganogile kamba wanhu wanogile, avo yamtandile Mndewa wanhu zake.”
42001018	Zakalia kamuuza msenga ija wa kuulanga, “Vino nojuwaze mbuli ino kamba ya ukweli? Niye na mwehe wangu twa wavele.”
42001019	Msenga ija kamwidika, “Niye na Gabilieli. Nokwima haulongozi ha Mulungu, heyo ayo yanhumile nonge na gweye kukupetela mbuli ino inogile.
42001020	Lakini kwavija hutogole mbuli zangu zonda zilawilile mna ikipindi chake, sambi hudaha kulonga mbaka siku vonda ilawilile mbuli ino.”
42001021	Kipindi acho wanhu wakalile wombeta Zakalia, wakanganya habali kokawa kulawa Mng'anda ya Mulungu.
42001022	Viyalawile kunze hadahile kulonga nao. Wajuwa hana kinhu cha unzonza kiyaonile Mng'anda ya Mulungu, kwavija kawagwaa kilaguso kwa kwinula makono gake, na kakala halonga.
42001023	Viyamambukize sang'hano yake Mng'anda ya Mulungu, kabwela ukae.
42001024	Hamwande kidogo imwehe Elizabeti kagoga inda. Hasegele ukayake kwa miezi mitano. Kalonga,
42001025	“Hakimambukizo Mndewa kanisegezela kinyala mgameso ga wanhu!”
42001026	Elizabeti viyakalile na inda ya miezi sita, Mulungu kamtuma msenga wa kuulanga, twaga jake Gabilieli, yachole kudibuga da Nazaleti, mwiisi ya Galilaya.
42001027	Kakala na usenga wa mhambe imoja yafungiligwe zengele na mbigalo imoja twaga jake Yusufu, yalawilile mulukolo lwa Mndewa Daudi. Mhambe ayo twaga jake Malia.
42001028	Msenga ija kamcholela Malia, kamulongela, “Zihoze! Mndewa kahamoja na gweye. Nayo kakunogela ng'hani!”
42001029	Malia viyauhulike usenga awo wa msenga wa kuulanga, kakala na mfundo ng'hani muumoyo wake, kakanganya usenga awo wofambula choni.
42001030	Msenga ija kamulongela, “Malia, sekeudumbe, gweye kupata ng'hekewa ya Mulungu.

42001057	Kipindi cha kuifungula Elizabeti vikivikile, kaifungula mwana wa kimbigalo.

42001063	Zakalia kawapula kibao cha kwandikila, kandika vino, “Twaga jake Yohana.” Wanhu wose wakanganya!

42001065	Wanhu weli behi nayo wadumba ng'hani. Mbuli izo za unzonza zibwililika kila hanhu kuvigongo va isi ya Yudea.

42002001	Kipindi acho, Agusito, Mndewa wa Lumi, kalagiza wanhu wose mwiisi ya Lumi wapetigwe.

42002006	Viwakalile kudibuga da Beselehemu, kipindi cha Malia kuifungula kivika.

42002008	Kilo acho kukala na wasusilaji wa ng'hondolo mna imigunda ilibehi na Beselehemu, wakala wokaliza fugo zao.

42002010	Lakini msenga ija kawalongela, “Sekemudumbe! Niye niwagalila mbuli inogile, mbuli yonda itende wanhu wose wadeng'helele.

42002012	Kino acho kilaguso kumwenu, momvika mwana king'hele kavazigwa vikumbi, katambalizigwa hanhu hoodimiligwa ng'ombe.”

42002018	Wanhu wose wahulike kija kiwalongile wasusilaji, wakanganya.

42002020	Wasusilaji wabwela kuno wokwimba nyila za kumtogola Mulungu kwa mbuli zose ziwahulike na kuzona. Zose zilawilila kamba msenga wa kuulanga viyawalongele.
42002021	Mna isiku ya nane, siku ya kwingizigwa imwana kumbi, wamgwaa twaga da Yesu. Twaga ijo kagweleligwa na msenga wa kuulanga mamake hanagoga inda.
42002022	Vikivikile kipindi cha kuisunha kamba Musa viyalagize mna Gamalagizo gake, Yusufu na Malia wamsola imwana na wachola nayo Yelusalemu muladi wamwike mgameso ga Mndewa,
42002023	kamba viyandikigwe mna Gamalagizo ga Mndewa, “Kila mwana wa chaudele wa kimbigalo yonda yavumbuke yagaligwe mgameso ga Mndewa.”

42002028	Simeoni kamsola imwana mmakono gake, kamtogola Mulungu, kalonga,

42002031	ukombozi uutandile mgameso ga wanhu wose.

42002034	Simeoni kawatambikila, kamulongela Malia, “Mwana ino kasaguligwa na Mulungu mbuli ya kupotela na kukomboligwa wanhu wengi wa Izilaeli. Nayo kokuwa kilaguso kulawa kwa Mulungu, na wanhu wengi womulema.
42002035	Abaho magesa ga wanhu wengi gogubuligwa. Na gweye mwenyego, usungu uli kamba panga dikutwa dousoma moyo wako.”

42002037	Nayo kakala mgane mbaka viyavikize miyaka malongo manane na nne. Kipindi chose acho kakala Mng'anda ya Mulungu imisi na ikilo, komgwaa ukulu Mulungu, kopula na kofunga kuja.

42004022	Wose wamtogola na wakanganya mbuli zake zinogile ziyalongile. Walonga, “Vino ino siyo mwanage Yusufu?.”

42004024	Yesu kagendelela kulonga, “Nowalongela ukweli, kuduhu mtula ndagu yotegelezigwa ukayake.
42004025	“Nhegelezeni, ona kukala na wagane wengi mwiisi ya Izilaeli mna ikipindi cha Eliya. Kipindi acho, mvula haitowile miyaka midatu na nusu, kukala na lufilili lwa nzala mwiisi yose.
42004026	Lakini Eliya hatumigwe bule kwa munhu yoyose iyagwe mwiisi ya Izilaeli, ila kwa mgane imoja yakalile Selepata, mwiisi ya Sidoni.
42004027	Vivija mna ikipindi cha mtula ndagu wa Mulungu Elisha, kukala na wanhu wengi wakalile wolumwa utamu wa dikulu mwiisi ya Izilaeli. Lakini kuduhu munhu yoyose iyagwe yahonyigwe, ila Naamani yaiyeka, munhu wa isi ya Siliya.”
42004028	Wanhu wakalile mng'anda ya kumpula Mulungu wagevuzika ng'hani viwahulike avo.
42004029	Wenuka, wamulava kunze kudibuga jao dizengigwe uchanha kukigongo, wamgala mbaka mwiingema ya kigongo acho, walonda kumpigisa hasi.
42004030	Lakini Yesu kabita hagati ya lunhu luja, kalawanya.
42004031	Abaho Yesu kachola kudibuga da Kapelinaumu mwiisi ya Galilaya. Mwiisiku ya Kubwihila, kakala yofundiza wanhu.
42004032	Mafundizo gake gawakanganya wanhu wose, kwavija kakala kolonga kwa udahi.
42004033	Mng'anda ya kumpula Mulungu kukala na munhu yeli na kinyamkela. Kalila kwa sauti ng'hulu,
42004034	“Oii! Kolonda kututenda choni, Yesu wa Nazaleti? Vino kwiza kutukoma? Nokujuwa, Gweye kwa ija Yang'alile wa Mulungu!”
42004035	Yesu kamkomhokela ikinyamkela ija, “Nyamala! Mulawe munhu ino!” Kinyamkela kambwanha hasi munhu ija mgameso gao, abaho kamulawa bila kumulumiza.
42004036	Wanhu wose wakanganya ng'hani na wailongela, “Mbuli gani zino? Munhu ino kana nguvu na udahi wa kuwakomhokela vinyamkela, nao womtegeleza!”
42004037	Avo mbuli za Yesu zibwililika kila hanhu mwiisi ija.
42004038	Yesu kalawa kuna ing'anda ya kumpula Mulungu, kachola ukayake Simoni. Mkwe wa kitwanzi wa Simoni kakala yolumwa homa ng'hali, avo wamulongela Yesu yamuhonye.
42004039	Yesu kamcholela, kema behi na lusazi lwa mtwanzi ayo, kaikomhokela homa imulawe. Homa imulawa, bahaja mtwanzi ija kenuka, kasonga kuwasang'hanila.
42004040	Zuwa vidihongile, wanhu wose wakalile na watamu wawagala kwa Yesu, nayo keka makono gake uchanha mwa kila munhu na kuwahonya wose.
42004041	Vinyamkela wawalawa wanhu wengi na kuguta, “Gweye kwa mwana wa Mulungu!” Yesu kawakomhokela na kawagomesa kulonga, kwavija wamjuwa kamba kakala Kilisito.
42004042	Imitondo yake, Yesu kasegela kudibuga, kachola hanhu kuduhu wanhu. Wanhu wasonga kumzahila, na viwamone, walonda kumgomesa sekeyachole.
42004043	Lakini Yesu kawalongela, “Vivija nolondeka kuwapetela wanhu wa mmabuga gayagwe Mbuli Inogile ya Undewa wa Mulungu, kwavija acho kiyanhumile Mulungu kukisang'hana.”
42004044	Avo kawapetela wanhu mzing'anda za kumpula Mulungu mwiisi yose ya Yudea.
42005001	Siku dimoja Yesu kakala yemile mumgwazo wa lamba da Genesaleti. Wanhu wengi wakala woisung'ha sung'ha wategeleza mbuli ya Mulungu.
42005002	Yesu kazona ngalawa mbili zikalile mwiingema ya lamba, zilekigwe na wavula somba, wakalile wosunha mizavu yao.
42005003	Yesu kengila mwiingalawa imoja ikalile ya Simoni, kamulonda Simoni yaikwese mgamazi. Abaho Yesu kakala mwiingalawa, kafundiza lunhu luja.
42005004	Viyamambukize kufundiza, kamulongela Simoni, “Kwesa ingalawa mbaka kuna gamazi mengi, abaho gweye na wayago mupigise mizavu yenu muvule somba.”
42005005	Simoni kamwidika, “Go mkulu, tusang'hana ng'hani kilo kigima lakini hatupatile kinhu bule. Lakini kamba gweye kolonga avo, nogela mizavu yangu mgamazi.”
42005006	Wapigisa mizavu yao, somba wengi wanamata mbaka mizavu yao ilonda kudegeka.
42005007	Avo wawakema wayao wakalile mwiingalawa iyagwe weze kuwataza. Wayao weza na wazimemeza ngalawa zose mbili, zose zikala zimemile somba mbaka zilonda kudidimila.
42005008	Simoni Petulo viyachonile kija kilawilile, kamfugamila Yesu mmagulu, kalonga, “Mndewa, segela haulongozi wangu, niye nimema nzambi!”
42005009	Simoni na wayage wakanganya ng'hani mbuli ya somba wengi wawapatile.
42005010	Vivija wayage Simoni, Yakobo na Yohana, wanage Zebedayo, nao wakanganya. Yesu kamulongela Simoni, “Sekeudumbe. Kulawa sambi kokuwa mvulaji wa wanhu.”
42005011	Wazilava ngalawa zao kunze mumgwazo, wavileka vinhu vose, wamkweleleza Yesu.
42005012	Yesu viyakalile kudibuga dimoja, kukala na munhu imoja yakalile na utamu wa dikulu. Viyamonile Yesu, kaibwanha hasi, kampula, “Go mkulu, wahalonda, kodaha kunihonya!”
42005013	Yesu kagolosa mkono wake, kamkwasa. Kalonga, “Nolonda, hona!” Bahaja utamu wa dikulu umulawa munhu ija.
42005014	Yesu kamulagiza, “Sekeumulongele munhu yoyose, lakini goga inzila mbaka kwa mulava nhosa ukailaguse, abaho kalave nhosa kamba viyalagize Musa ili kutenda kila munhu yatogole kamba kuhonyigwa.”
42005015	Lakini mbuli za Yesu zibwililika kila hanhu. Wanhu wengi weza kumtegeleza na kuhonyigwa mitamu yao.
42005016	Lakini Yesu kacholaga hanhu kuduhu wanhu na kampula Mulungu.
42005017	Siku dimoja Yesu viyakalile kofundiza, Mafalisayo wayagwe na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wakala aho. Wakala walawile kila buga mwiisi ya Galilaya na Yudea na kulawa Yelusalemu. Nguvu ya Mndewa ikala hamoja na Yesu kuwahonya watamu.
42005018	Wanhu wayagwe weza kuno wampapa mulusazi munhu yaholole. Wageza kumwingiza mng'anda wamwike haulongozi wa Yesu.
42005019	Lakini hawapatile nzila ya kumwingiza mng'anda, kwavija kukala na lunhu lwa wanhu. Avo wamsola mtamu wao, wamgala uchanha kukiswili, watobola zonzo. Abaho wamuhumulusa na lusazi lwake mbaka hagati ya lunhu lwa wanhu, wamwika haulongozi wa Yesu.
42005020	Yesu viyone kutamanila kwao, kamulongela munhu ija, “Mbwigangu, nzambi zako zigeligwa kumgongo.”
42005021	Wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo wasonga kuiuza, “Munhu gani ino kolonga mbuli za kumuliga Mulungu? Mulungu yaiyeka ayo yodaha kuzigela kumgongo nzambi za wanhu!”
42005022	Yesu kajuwa viwagesile, avo kawalongela, “Habali mogesa avo?
42005023	Choni kibuhile, kulonga, ‘Nzambi zako zigeligwa kumgongo,’ hebu kulonga, ‘Ima utembele’?
42005024	Lakini nolonda mujuwe kamba Mwana wa Munhu kana udahi mwiisi wa kuzigela kumgongo nzambi za wanhu.” Abaho kamulongela munhu ija yaholole, “Nokulongela, ima, papa lusazi lwako, uchole ukayako!”
42005025	Bahaja munhu ija kenuka mgameso ga wanhu, kapapa lusazi lwake mumo muyatambalale, kachola ukayake kuno komtogola Mulungu.
42005026	Wanhu wose wakanganya ng'hani na kudumba! Wamtogola Mulungu walonga, “Lelo tona unzonza!”
42005027	Abaho Yesu kachola na kamona mbokela kodi yakemigwe Lawi kakala mng'anda ya kusolela kodi. Yesu kamulongela, “Nikweleleze.”
42005028	Lawi kenuka, kaleka kila kinhu, kamkweleleza.
42005029	Abaho Lawi kamtendela Yesu nyimwili nyimwili ng'hulu ukayake. Vivija kukala na wabokela kodi wengi na wanhu wayagwe wagonekigwe.
42005030	Mafalisayo na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wayagwe wakalile aho wawauza wanahina wa Yesu, “Habali moja na kung'wa hamoja na wabokela kodi na wanhu wotenda nzambi?”
42005031	Yesu kawedika, “Wanhu wagima hawalonda mganga, lakini waja weli watamu womulonda mganga.
42005032	Sizile kuwakema wanhu wogesa wanoga, lakini niza kuwakema waja wene nzambi waleke.”
42005033	Wanhu wayagwe wamulongela Yesu, “Wanahina wa Yohana Mbatizaji wofunga kuja miyanza mingi na kumpula Mulungu, na wanahina wa Mafalisayo wotenda vivo, lakini wanahina zako woja na kung'wa.”
42005034	Yesu kawedika, “Vino mogesa wanhu wagonekigwe kuna idizengele wodaha kufunga kuja kipindi munhu yosola kahamoja nao? Havidahika bule!
42005035	Lakini kipindi chokwiza, munhu yosola vonda yasegezigwe kumwao, baho wofunga kuja.”
42005036	Abaho Yesu kawalongela lusimo luno, “Kuduhu munhu yokanha kilaka mkiwalo cha sambi na kukika mkiwalo cha umwaka. Yahatenda avo, kokinanga kija kiwalo cha sambi, na kilaka acho honda kiigale na kiwalo cha umwaka.
42005037	Vivija kuduhu munhu yogida divai ya sambi mna mifuko ya ng'hwembe ya umwaka. Kwavija yahatenda avo, divai ya sambi yoitula mifuko ayo ya umwaka, divai yokwitika, na mifuko yobanangika.
42005038	Divai ya sambi yogidigwa mmifuko ya ng'hwembe ya sambi!
42005039	Kuduhu munhu yolonda divai ya sambi yahamambukiza kung'wa ya umwaka. Kwavija kolonga, ‘Ya umwaka inoga ng'hani.’ ”
42006001	Mna isiku imoja ya Kubwihila, Yesu kakala yobita mmigunda ya uhemba. Wanahina zake wasonga kubena mikungwi ya uhemba, wagafigisa mmakono gao na kuja mhule zake.
42006002	Mafalisayo wayagwe wawauza, “Habali motenda kinhu kigomesigwe mna isiku ya Kubwihila?”
42006003	Yesu kawedika, “Vino mweye hamusomile kija kiyatendile Daudi na wayage viwakalile na nzala?
42006004	Daudi kengila Mng'anda ya Mulungu, kasola magate galavigwe kwa Mulungu, kagaja na vivija kawagwaa wayage. Malagizo gawagomesa wanhu wayagwe kuja magate gago ila kwa walava nhosa waiyeka.”
42006005	Abaho Yesu kamambukiza kwa kulonga, “Mwana wa Munhu ayo Mndewa wa siku ya Kubwihila.”
42006006	Mna isiku iyagwe ya Kubwihila, Yesu kengila mng'anda ya kumpula Mulungu na kafundiza. Baho kukala na munhu imoja, mkono wake wa kudila ukala uholole.
42006007	Wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo wayagwe wakala wozahila kilamuso cha kumtagusa Yesu, avo wakala womulola wamone kamba komuhonya munhu mwiisiku ya Kubwihila.
42006008	Lakini Yesu kawajuwa viwagesile, kamulongela munhu ija yaholole mkono, “Ima wize hano haulongozi.” Munhu ija kenuka na kwima hagati.
42006009	Abaho Yesu kawalongela, “Nowauza, vino Malagizo getu gotulonda tutende choni mwiisiku ya Kubwihila? Kutenda ganogile hebu kutenda gehile? Kuhonya ugima wa munhu hebu kuukoma?”
42006010	Yesu kawalola wanhu wose wakalile aho, abaho kamulongela munhu ija, “Golosa mkono wako.” Munhu ija katenda avo, na mkono wake uhona kabili.
42006011	Lakini wanhu wagevuzika ng'hani na wasonga kuilongela wamtende choni Yesu.
42006012	Kipindi kija Yesu kachola kuna ikigongo kumpula Mulungu, kakala ako kilo kigima kompula Mulungu.
42006013	Imitondo yake, kawakema wanahina zake, kawasagula longo na wabili mna idibumbila jao, kawagwaa twaga da watumigwa.
42006014	Watumigwa awo wakala Simoni, ayo Yesu kamkema Petulo na Andeleya mdodo wake, Yakobo na Yohana, Filipo na Batulumayo,
42006015	Matayo na Tomaso na Yakobo mwanage Alufayo na Simoni yakemigwe Zelote,
42006016	Yuda mwanage Yakobo na Yuda Isikaliote yamuhinduke Yesu.
42006017	Yesu viyahumuluke kukigongo hamoja na watumigwa zake, kema hanhu hagoloke hamoja na wanahina zake wengi. Lunhu mkulu lwa wanhu lukala aho kulawa isi yose ya Yudea na buga da Yelusalemu, na kulawa mhwani ya isi za Tilo na Sidoni.
42006018	Weza kumtegeleza Yesu na kuhonyigwa mitamu yao. Vivija wanhu waja wakalile wogazigwa na vinyamkela weza na wahonyigwa.
42006019	Wanhu wose wageza kumkwasa Yesu, kwavija nguvu ya kuhonya ikala ilawa kumwake na kuwahonya wose.
42006020	Yesu kawalola wanahina zake, kalonga, “Mmweda mweye muli wakiwa, kwavija Undewa wa Mulungu uli wenu.
42006021	Mmweda mweye muli na nzala sambi, kwavija mokwiguta! Mmweda mweye mulila sambi, kwavija modeng'helela!”
42006022	“Mmweda mweye kamba wanhu womwihilani, wowalema, wowaliga na kuwalonga vihile kwa mbuli ya Mwana wa Munhu!
42006023	Deng'heleleni na kuvina vonda galawilile, kwavija mwikiligwa nhunza ng'hulu kuulanga. Kwavija vivo wahenga zao viwawatendele watula ndagu wa Mulungu.
42006024	Lakini mogaya mweye muli matajili sambi, kwavija mmala kupata deng'ho jenu!
42006025	Mogaya mweye mwigute sambi, kwavija mokona nzala! Mogaya mweye museka sambi, kwavija moiyalala na kulila!”
42006026	“Mogaya mweye kamba wanhu wose wowagwaa nhogolwa kwavija wahenga zao vivija wawatendela vivo watula ndagu wa uvizi.”
42006027	“Lakini nowalongela mweye munitegeleza, wanogeleni wamwihileni, muwatendele ganogile waja wowatendela gehile.
42006028	Muwatambikile waja wowaduila, na muwapulile kwa Mulungu waja womonelani.
42006029	Munhu yonda yakutowe kanza dimoja, muleke yakutowe kanza diyagwe vivija, kamba munhu kokuboka koti jako, muleke yasole na shati jako vivija.
42006030	Munhu yahakupula kinhu mgwee, na munhu yokuboka vinhu vako, sekeulonde yakubwezele.
42006031	Avo watendeleni wayagwe gaja gose gomulonda mweye kutendeligwa.”
42006032	“Kamba mweye mowanogela wanhu wowanogela mweye waiyeka, vino motenda kilozo gani? Hata wanhu wene nzambi wowanogela waja wowanogela hewo!
42006033	Na kamba mowatendela ganogile waja wowatendela ganogile waiyeka, vino motenda kilozo gani? Hata wanhu wene nzambi wotenda vivo!
42006034	Na kamba mowakopesha waja waiyeka mutamanila wodaha kuwabwezela, vino motenda kilozo gani? Hata wanhu wene nzambi wowakopesha wayao wotamanila wodaha kuwabwezela kikija kiwawakopeshe!
42006035	Lakini mweye wanogeleni waja womwihileni na muwatendele ganogile, muwakopeshe wanhu bila kutamanila kubwelezeligwa. Abaho nhunza yenu yokuwa ng'hulu, na mweye mokuwa wana wa Mulungu yeli Uchanha Ng'hani. Kwavija heyo kanoga kwa waja weliduhu nhogolwa kumwake na wanhu wotenda nzambi.
42006036	Muwe na bazi kamba vija Tata yenu viyeli na bazi.”
42006037	“Sekemuwataguse wayagwe, Mulungu honda yawataguse mweye. Sekemuwalaumu wayagwe, na Mulungu honda yawalaumu mweye. Mugele kumgongo nzambi za wanhu wayagwe, na Mulungu kogela kumgongo nzambi zenu.
42006038	Muwagwee wayagwe, na Mulungu kowagwaa mweye. Na mweye mobokela kibaba kimemile na kusindiligwa mbaka vokwitika mmakono genu, na vose vonda mudahe kuvigoga. Avo, vija vimuwapimila wayagwe, Mulungu nayo kowapimila vivo.”
42006039	Abaho Yesu kawalongela lusimo luno, “Msuwameso hadaha kumulongoza msuwameso miyage. Yahatenda vivo, wose wabili wolagalila mdikolombo.
42006040	Kuduhu mwanahina yombanza mfundiza wake. Lakini kila mwanahina yahamambukiza mafunzo gake, koigala na mfundiza wake.
42006041	“Habali kolola kibanzi kili mdisiso da ndugu yako lakini hulola biki dili mdisiso jako?
42006042	Hebu kodahaze kumulongela ndugu yako, ‘Chonde, leka nikulave kibanzi kili mdisiso jako,’ kuno gweye ung'hali hunajona biki dili mdisiso jako mwenyego? Gweye kwa mtapitapi! Tanhu lava biki dili mdisiso jako, abaho kodaha kulola goya na kulava kibanzi kili mdisiso da ndugu yako.
42006043	“Mbiki unogile haudaha kulela matunda gehile, hebu mbiki wihile haudaha kulela matunda ganogile.
42006044	Kila mbiki wojuwika kwa matunda gake goulela, kwavija hudaha kubawa ngama mumkese hebu kubawa fulu kuna ivisolo va miba.
42006045	Munhu yanogile kolava ganogile mwiingama yake inogile ili muumoyo wake, lakini munhu yehile kolava gehile mwiingama yake ihile ili muumoyo wake. Kwavija munhu kolonga gaja gamemile muumoyo wake.
42006046	“Habali monikema, ‘Mndewa, Mndewa,’ kuno hamugatenda gaja goniwalongela?
42006047	Munhu yoyose yokwiza kumwangu na kutegeleza mbuli zangu na kuzigoga nowalagusila kaigala na choni.
42006048	Kaigala na munhu yozenga ng'anda yake yahimbile hasi ng'hani, keka chandusilo chake mdibwe. Mvula ng'hulu viitowile, mazi gaitowa ing'anda, lakini hagadahile kuitigisa kwavija ikala izengigwe goya.
42006049	Lakini munhu yoyose yotegeleza mbuli zangu na kolema kuzigoga, kaigala na munhu yazengile ng'anda yake bila kuhimba chandusilo. Mvula ng'hulu viitowile, mazi gaitowa ng'anda ija, nayo igwa na kubanangika!”
42007001	Yesu viyamambukize kuwafundiza wanhu, kachola Kapelinaumu.
42007002	Ako kukala na mkulu imoja wa wakalizi gana wa Kilumi yakalile na msang'hanaji wake mtamu ng'hani, na kalonda kufa. Nayo mkulu ayo kakala yomnogela ng'hani msang'hanaji ayo.

42007008	Kwavija naniye vivija na hasi ya udahi wa wakulu na nina wakalizi hasi yangu. Nahamulongela ino, ‘Chola!’ nayo kochola, nahamulongela iyagwe, ‘Izo!’ nayo kokwiza, vivija nahamulongela msang'hanaji wangu, ‘Tenda vino!’ nayo kotenda vivo.”
